"Ow! watch it!"

"Hang on...where’s Nagato?"
"Hmm?...oh, she's not here?" typical Haruhi. I'm sometimes unsure whether she actually knows that Nagato is one of the club members.

See...Nagato's an...alien? Robot? I don’t know anymore. The point is, she isn’t human. She's here to study Haruhi, make sure there’s no change to "the flow of data." More on that later....

As I was sitting at my seat, the door opened, and...

1111.title: The Reunion

11111.content:

I followed him outside, to the table we normally sit at to talk. The day was nice and sunny, but the air fell strangely heavy.
"you can feel it, cant you?"
"that air?"
"yes. That’s because we are literally on the edge of a closed space."
"You've got to be kidding me!" Closed spaces were little pocket dimensions that house very large destructive monsters. The more destruction, the large the closed space gets. Koizumi fights these things along with other members of his organization. This is because he's an Esper. Esper's are basically normal humans with psychic abilities, although Koizumi can only use his power inside a closed space.
"I'm not. normally, we would fight it off before it enveloped the school, but there’s a rather large problem in the way...Miss Suzumiya."
"what’s going on?"
"The limit to the closed space is right next to the building our club room is in. The problem is, the space is just small enough that fighting off what’s in there will allow the closed space to shatter. When that happens, Miss Suzumiya will notice us, or at least the space shattering.
Then there’s the fact that she’s right next to it. if the closed space gets big enough to absorb her...well, we don’t want that to happen at any rate."
"Why tell me?! What can I do?" I regretted asking the question the second it was out of my mouth.
"You have two options really. Either distract her so we can take the thing out and she wont notice, or drag her away somewhere. Either way, we need to act fast.”

111111212121.content:
That day was, mostly, an average club meeting. Yuki was playing on her laptop, Koizumi was playing a board game with Kyon, and Mikuru was busy making tea. Haruhi was on her computer, as she usually was nowadays. The only thing that was noticeably different about her was a slightly bigger body - she had gained about 15 pounds or so in the short timeframe she'd been doing this. She wasn't as large as she was hoping to get, but progress was progress, no matter how small. Her thighs and arms were slightly chubbier, and her belly was beginning to push against her uniform.

Mikuru had noticed their leader's slight increase in size; however, she remained silent about it. Knowing Haruhi, if Mikuru did mention it to her, she might decide to begin forcing her to gain too. Far better, she reasoned, to keep safe by keeping quiet.

While she was pleased with what little progress she had made, she couldnt help but feel a little disappointed. She knew that things like this took time, but she couldn't help getting a little impatient about it. Thats why, instead of her usual routine of masturbating or looking on BBW sites, she was looking for tips on gaining weight online. With the great wealth of information online, she reasoned, there would surely be a useful recipe she could use, or an eating or some type of technique she could do to help her gain a little quicker.

Unfortunately, as she had found out, that wasn't the case. There was next to no information regarding tips on actually getting FAT. Losing weight was the most numerous topic, next to building muscle. However, there was hardly any solid facts on actually fattening up.
As a result, she was feeling a mix of emotions:
Frustration that she couldn't find something on the INTERNET, of all places,
Dissapointed, because she was doing this on her own without help, and that'd probably take months,
And Saddened, because her search reminded her that most everyone seemed to hate the idea of getting fat.

She sank in her chair, closing the Internet window and putting her head on the desk. She hated having to admit it, but...
...she needed some help. But who?

1111112121211.content:
"Kyon, I wanna talk to you in private," Haruhi said, her skin slightly pale despite her firm, strong voice at the end of a meeting. Kyon glanced over at the other members, Koizumi smiling a broad, stupid grin as he always did. Yuki seemed apathetic, but Mikuru was filled with fear for Kyon. The parting glance she gave him resembled that of a wife watching her husband walking off to the gallows.

How bad could it be?

"Kyon, listen, we need to talk."

"Yeah, I got that from the first thing you said. What's up?"

"Do you know any way to get fat fast?"

Kyon couldn't help but crack up at this. His laughter ran throughout his entire body as he nearly doubled over. Haruhi's face turned a slight shade of red, but not the bashful embarrassed red so much as the pissed off, murderous red that Kyon commonly associated with pain. Indeed, his laughter died in his throat as Haruhi bashed her still hard as rock knuckles against the crown of his head.

"Look, have you considered just eating a lot?"

"Too slow. I want it now."

"Uh, look, Haruhi, there's no healthy way to get fat that quickly. You can try implant surgery, but that's unhealthy, or maybe weight gain powder that muscle builders use, but who knows how that actually works. Look, the fact is that it isn't very healthy to get so big in the first place, so why--?"

"I don't care about health! I just want it now!"

"Look, I'll do some research on it if you want, but I think you might need to reconsider. You might end up with heart disease or something."

"How many times do I have to say 'I don't care' before it sinks in? Geez, and you're supposed to be smart!"

"Well, why didn't you just ask Yuki? She'd give you an answer like that."

Haruhi twirled a lock of her hair around her finger, in a lazy sort of way. "Because..."

"Because why?"

"Just because! Look, Kyon, give me a method before tomorrow, or else there'll be hell to pay!"

"How wonderfully vague of a punishment..."
